article.title: AMPEX and Calculex to Provide Airborne Data Recorders
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: AMPEX Data Corporation, Redwood City, California, and Calculex Incorporated, Las Cruces, New Mexico, were awarded a $15 million contract to provide airborne data recorders.Â Air Armament Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Florida is the contracting authority.
